notes_log.text: the pain is still going on, it's mainly on the right side of my temple, neck and scapular area

Okay, this is today's entry. I woke up at 3 a.m., went to bed at 9 p.m., and stayed up for probably two hours or so, and then fell back to sleep and got up at 7 a.m. And then I did heat therapy to relax the neck, but the left scapula pain is still there. It's the day 4. I feel like it's less, so I would give it a pain level of 2. And then I had breakfast, which is one cup of cashew gold cereal, one cup of 1% milk, one cup of blueberries, and two slices of whole wheat bread. And then I did a ring fit exercise between 9, 10 a.m. to 9, 30 a.m., 20 minutes.

um lunch we had indian food um lamb vindaloo and rice and i had one samosa had about a half of the lamb vindaloo and uh i don't know probably less than um um two-fifth of a cup of rice and a little bit um now garlic rosemary now um and then i tried to take a nap but failed to do so i did a heat of ferrity before i go to nap on my neck and then i've been just programming after i got up at 2 p.m um and then because there's an error in the app that i didn't notice and where it just had to redo everything um i feel like that intense uh in thought caused a little bit of pain on my right temple and then i ate a honey crispy apple try to relieve it i'm going to back off from the current day's programming soon and then just focus on relaxing i think now it's not a good time to keep working.
for the right temple pain episode, I applied salonpass patches and also mint essential oil to relief it.
